DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate bioequivalence alendronate combination vitamin D compare alendronate alone bioequivalence vitamin D combination alendronate compare vitamin D alone . This open-label , randomize , 2-part , crossover study . Each participant participate one part study ( i.e. , participant participate Part I Part II ) . Participants enter study sequentially within part study . A washout least 12 day separate treatment period within part study .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Bioequivalence 70-mg Alendronate 70-mg Alendronate Combination With 5600 IU Vitamin D ( MK0217A-253 )
DOC.criteria: Male nonpregnant female age 18 85 year female childbearing potential appropriate method contraception nurse Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less equal 30 kg/m2 subject good health mental legal incapacitation receive bisphosphonate treatment within 3 month enrollment . unable sit stand upright least 2 hour unwilling refrain consumption alcohol caffeinated product 24 hour prior 36 hour study drug administration unwilling limit alcohol consumption 2 drink per day unwilling limit caffeinated product equivalent 4 cup coffee per day equivalent . unwilling refrain smoking study
